scarlet plague is a post-apocalyptic fiction novel written by jack london and originally published in london magazine in 1912 .	the turnstile is a 1912 political novel by the english author a. e. w. mason .	the troubled man ( swedish : den orolige mannen ) is a crime fiction novel by swedish author henning mankell , featuring police inspector kurt wallander .	missing ( swedish : saknad ) is a 2000 crime fiction novel by swedish author karin alvtegen .
of men and monsters is a science fiction novel by american writer william tenn , published in june 1968 as a paperback by ballantine books .	the martian general 's daughter is a 2008 science fiction novel by theodore judson .	war cry is a hardback graphic novel written by science fiction and fantasy author jim butcher and illustrated by carlos gomez .	ghoul , goblin is a hardback graphic novel written by science fiction and fantasy author jim butcher and illustrated by joseph cooper .	my brother 's keeper is a 1982 science fiction novel by charles sheffield , published as a paperback original by ace books in 1982 .	tekwar is a science fiction novel written by william shatner and ( uncredited ) science fiction author ron goulart .	the outpost is a science fiction novel by american writer mike resnick , first published as hardback by tor books in may 2001 , followed by paperback edition in august 2002 .	the general of the dead army ( albanian : gjenerali i ushtrisë së vdekur ) is a 1963 novel by the albanian writer ismail kadare .	built for trouble , by american novelist al fray , was published in 1958 as a dell ( paperback ) first edition .	diaspora is a hard science fiction novel by the australian writer greg egan which first appeared in print in 1997 .	web is a science fiction novel written by the english science fiction author john wyndham .	options is a 1975 absurdist science fiction novel by robert sheckley , published in paperback by pyramid books .	pollard is the debut novel of laura beatty , first published in hardback in 2008 by chatto windus and the following year in paperback by vintage books .	eternity ( 1988 ) is a science fiction novel by greg bear .	les fourmis ( english : the ants ) is a 1991 science fiction novel by french writer bernard werber .	the king 's general is a novel , published in 1946 , by english author and playwright daphne du maurier .	come back for more , by american novelist al fray , was published in 1958 as a dell ( paperback ) first edition .	autobiografía del general franco ( 1992 ) ( english , autobiography of general franco ) is a novel by manuel vázquez montalbán .	avana ivan ( english : is that him ? )	the last english king ( 1997 ) is a historical novel by english writer julian rathbone .
the dark eyes of london is a crime novel by the british writer edgar wallace which was first published in 1924 .	the mind readers is a crime novel by margery allingham , first published in 1965 , in the united kingdom by chatto windus , london .	the god child is a crime novel by english author paul sayer published in 1996 .	the china governess is a crime novel by margery allingham , first published in 1963 , in the united kingdom by chatto windus , london .	the white family is a novel by english author maggie gee , published in 2002 in london by saqi books .	the london eye mystery is a children 's mystery novel by english author siobhan dowd .	montmorency is a crime novel and thriller set in victorian era london , written by eleanor updale and published by scholastic in 2003 .	london boulevard is a 2010 british independent crime noir film released in the united kingdom on 26 november 2010 .	set in 1970s london , legacy is a spy novel by english author alan judd .	going wrong ( 1990 ) is a novel by english crime writer ruth rendell .	the great fire of london is a novel by the english author peter ackroyd .	the sculptress ( 1993 ) is a crime novel by english writer minette walters .	the tinder box ( 1999 ) is a crime novella by english writer minette walters .	the dark room ( 1995 ) is a crime novel by english writer minette walters .	disordered minds ( 2003 ) is a crime novel by english writer minette walters .	moon over soho is the second novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch .	the hanging tree is the sixth novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch .	whispers under ground 1 is the third novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch , published 2012 by gollancz .	foxglove summer is the fifth novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch , published 2014 by gollancz .	broken homes is the fourth novel in the rivers of london series by english author ben aaronovitch , published 2013 by gollancz .
the 5th wave is a young adult science fiction novel written by american author rick yancey .	the immortals is a 1996 science fiction novel by tracy hickman , originally published in hardcover by roc .	the power of six is the second book in the young adult science fiction series the lorien legacies , written by pittacus lore ( james frey and jobie hughes ) .	the fall of the stone city ( albanian : darka e gabuar ) is a 2008 novel by the albanian writer ismail kadare .	foundation 's edge ( 1982 ) is a science fiction novel by american writer isaac asimov , the fourth book in the foundationseries .	the pollinators of eden is the second science fiction novel by john boyd , originally published in hardcover by weybright talley in 1969 .	the rowan ( 1990 ) is a science fiction novel by american writer anne mccaffrey , the first book in `` the tower and the hive '' series ( also known as `` the rowan '' series ) .	the traitor 's niche ( albanian : kamarja e turpit ) is a historical novel by the albanian author ismail kadare .	the book of dreams is a science fiction book by american author jack vance , the fifth and last novel ( 1981 ) in the `` demon princes '' series .	glory road is a science fantasy novel by american writer robert a. heinlein , originally serialized in the magazine of fantasy science fiction ( july september 1963 ) and published in hardcover the same year .	the worthing saga ( 1990 ) is a science fiction book by american writer orson scott card , set in the worthing series .	diaspora is a hard science fiction novel by the australian writer greg egan which first appeared in print in 1997 .	the beacon , is a novel by english author susan hill , first published in 2008 by chatto and windus and in paperback the following year by vintage books .	me and you ( italian : io e te ) is a novel by niccolò ammaniti .	sixty days and counting ( 2007 ) is the third book in the hard science fiction science in the capital trilogy by kim stanley robinson .	1635 : the eastern front is an alternate history novel by eric flint in the 1632 series , first published in hardcover by baen books on october 5 , 2010 , with a paperback edition following from the same publisher in november 2011 .	the time museum is a big finish productions audiobook based on the long-running british science fiction television series doctor who .	teen idol was written by meg cabot and published in july 2004 in hardcover edition and in august 2005 in paperback edition .	the tiger in the well ( 1990 ) is a book by the english author philip pullman .	the shadow in the north ( 1986 ) is a book by the english author philip pullman .
destination mars is a juvenile science fiction novel , the sixth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	blast off at woomera is a children 's science fiction novel , the first in the chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	journey to jupiter is a juvenile science fiction novel , the eighth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	operation columbus is a juvenile science fiction novel , the third in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	expedition venus is a juvenile science fiction novel , the fifth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	nearly neptune is a juvenile science fiction novel by american writer hugh walters , the twelfth in his chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	the domes of pico is a juvenile science fiction novel , the second in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	the mohole mystery is a juvenile science fiction novel , the eleventh in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	mission to mercury is a juvenile science fiction novel , the ninth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	moon base one is a young adult science fiction novel , the fourth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	tony hale , space detective is a juvenile science fiction novel , the fifteenth in hugh walters ' chris godfrey of u.n.e.x.a .	venus plus x is a science fiction novel by american writer theodore sturgeon , published in 1960 .	the big u ( 1984 ) is a novel by american writer neal stephenson .	the hate u give is a young adult novel by angie thomas .	i am princess x is a 2015 book by cherie priest .	diaspora is a hard science fiction novel by the australian writer greg egan which first appeared in print in 1997 .	orphan x is a 2016 thriller novel written by gregg hurwitz .	fire star is a 2005 novel by an english author , chris d'lacey .	icefire is a 2003 children 's fantasy novel by english author chris d'lacey .	me and you ( italian : io e te ) is a novel by niccolò ammaniti .
